predicate.note: Frames file for 'petition' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to address a petition to, to make a request

example.name: transitive
example.text: Shareholders ' attorneys at the New York firm of Milberg , Weiss , Bershad , Specthrie & Lerach last week petitioned for a rehearing of the case .
example.arg: Shareholders ' attorneys at the New York firm of Milberg , Weiss , Bershad , Specthrie & Lerach
